channel.title: CVE Feed for CodeRevolution -- Echo RSS Feed Post Generator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodeRevolution -- Echo RSS Feed Post Generator

item.title: CVE-2024-9265|2024-10-01T13:31:58.423Z -- coderevolution -- echo%20rss%20feed%20post%20generator
item.description: The Echo RSS Feed Post Generator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.4.6. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting the roles that can set during registration through the echo_check_post_header_sent() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to register as an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-9265|2024-10-01T08:30:18.477Z -- coderevolution -- echo%20rss%20feed%20post%20generator
item.description: The Echo RSS Feed Post Generator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.4.6. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting the roles that can set during registration through the echo_check_post_header_sent() function.
